description.S1: Every Jolicoeur Original comes with a hand-crafted golden lapel.
description.S2: Celeste ordered a lapel to commemorate her prototype,
description.S3: but the parcel must be signed for and is still at HPS.
description.S4: Head to HPS and retrieve the parcel containing her lapel.

blurb.B1: Head there and speak to Olive Yates.
blurb.B2: She'll tell you to go to window B.
blurb.B3: Speak to Wanda Chen in window B to learn the parcel is already out for delivery.
blurb.B4: Head to the nav marker in the Estates District and read the note left on the door to learn that the parcel is now back at the HPS,
blurb.B5: you'll get the HPS Delivery Unsuccessful quest item.
blurb.B6: Speak to Wanda Chen again and she'll tell you to head to window A.
blurb.B7: Speak with Olive in Window A and show her your verification to receive the parcel and the Gold Lapel quest item.

dialog.speaker: HPSClerk (Female)
dialog.utterance: Welcome to Halcyon Parcel Service. Deliveries guaranteed within standard margins of accuracy!

dialog.speaker: HPSClerk (Female)
dialog.utterance: How may I be of assistance?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What exactly do you do here?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Celeste Jolicoeur sent me. I'm here to sign for a parcel.

dialog.speaker: HPSClerk (Female)
dialog.utterance: Halcyon Parcel Service is the most dependable parcel delivery service in the colony. You might even say we're part and parcel of Halcyon's commercial enterprise!

dialog.speaker: HPSClerk (Female)
dialog.utterance: That's just a little parcel joke.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: So if someone needed a package delivered, they'd come here?

dialog.speaker: HPSClerk (Female)
dialog.utterance: Nope. Just parcels. We don't deal in packages.

dialog.speaker: HPSClerk (Female)
dialog.utterance: It's very technical. Halcyon Parcel Service strictly adheres to the standards and definitions of packaging as outlined by the Executive Ministry of Accuracy and Morale.

dialog.speaker: HPSClerk (Female)
dialog.utterance: We can ship all the parcels you want. But if I start shipping packages, I could get into some real trouble. Handcuffs and hard labor trouble.

dialog.speaker: HPSClerk (Female)
dialog.utterance: If you would like to sign for a parcel, please go to Window B.
